security_audit.summary: Pure markdown context file with no executable code. Contains project documentation only. No file access, network calls, or command execution capabilities. Safe for publication.

content.value_statement: Accelerate Portfolio Buddy 2 development with instant access to tech stack, architecture, known issues, and component patterns. This context skill helps AI assistants deliver accurate, project-aware responses.
actual_capabilities: Provides complete tech stack for Portfolio Buddy 2
Documents known bugs and tech debt items
Describes component architecture and file structure
Lists architectural constraints and coding standards
Contains migration progress from legacy app
limitations: Does not execute code or perform calculations
Does not access external APIs or databases
Does not modify or create project files

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with other context skills?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill provides project-specific context and works alongside other general-purpose skills.

faq.question: What is the maximum component size allowed?
faq.answer: Components should not exceed 200 lines. Three components currently violate this as known tech debt.

faq.question: Does this skill connect to my database?
faq.answer: No. This skill only provides documentation context. It does not access any databases or APIs.

faq.question: Is my trade data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill contains no code that accesses files or data. It only provides static documentation.

faq.question: Why is my AI response not project-aware?
faq.answer: Ensure this skill is loaded before asking project-related questions. It provides the context needed.

faq.question: How does this compare to migration-tracker skill?
faq.answer: Portfolio-context covers current project state. Migration-tracker tracks progress migrating features from the legacy app.
